ELI - Smart Meeting NotePad for Better Focus & Understanding

Stay focused and understand every meeting better! ELI is your free AI meeting notepad that transforms how you experience online meetings.

Key Features: ğŸ¯
â€¢ Unlimited FREE meeting transcription (other services charge $15-20/month!)

â€¢ Smart Live meeting summarization
â€¢ One click bookmark meeting content you want to remember
â€¢ Floating NotePad for easy note-taking

Perfect for: ğŸ¯
â€¢ International teams needing translation
â€¢ Anyone who wants to focus better in meetings
â€¢ Teams looking to improve meeting productivity
â€¢ Non-native speakers who need extra support

Why ELI? âœ¨
â€¢ Zero cost for core features - use as much as you want!
â€¢ No app switching - works directly in Google Meet
â€¢ Perfect for international teams and non-native speakers
â€¢ Helps you stay focused and engaged in meetings
â€¢ Instantly review previous discussions

Start improving your meeting experience today - completely free, no credit card required!
